cons_P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between the creation date of this question (October 1, 2024) and January 1, 2028, any government passes legislation that explicitly allows the use of robotics in voting systems. The legislation must be officially enacted and published in the country's official legal records.

P.title: Will France pass legislation allowing the use of robotics in voting systems before January 1, 2028?
P.body: This question will be resolved as 'Yes' if, between the creation date of this question (October 1, 2024) and January 1, 2028, the French government passes legislation that explicitly allows the use of robotics in voting systems. The legislation must be officially enacted and published in the country's official legal records.
